titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the extended recovery period applicable to the depreciation of tax-exempt use property leased to foreign persons or entities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/19/2000--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal, for foreign persons or entities, the extended recovery period applicable to the tax-exempt use of property available under the alternative depreciation system for certain properties.
